name: Art Deco
prompt: A VibeDeck controller in Art Deco style from the 1920s. Geometric gold and black patterns. Sunburst motifs radiating from the rotary knob. Chrome and gold metallic finishes. Sharp angular shapes, symmetrical design. Buttons are geometric jewels - emerald, ruby, sapphire colored. The LCD has a gold decorative frame. Great Gatsby luxury aesthetic. Glamorous studio lighting with reflections.
